title: Whatsapp camera popup notification while use
content:
I always get popup notifications in the low part of the display about Whatsapp Camera when I'm using my Pixel 3a, even when I don't have Whatsapp open.

I've this issue only on my Pixel, my Nokia 7.1 with Android 10 doesn't get any strange popup notification.

The name of the notification is "Can't start the camera. Please reboot your phone"
